AUTHOR: palmtree5
INSTALL_MSG:
Thanks for installing Mcsvr, which enables checking if a server is up, as well as the server's player count.
[p]mcsvr to see commands. Requires `mcstatus`.
For support: <http://support.palmtree5.com>

If you like my work and want to support me, please consider becoming a Patron over at <https://patreon.com/palmtree5>
NAME: Mcsvr
SHORT: Cog for getting Minecraft server status
DESCRIPTION: Gets the status of a Minecraft Server (specifically version and player count)
